thread.title: BRIEF-FMR LLC ups its indirect holding of NNIT shares to 5.05 pct
thread.title_full: BRIEF-FMR LLC ups its indirect holding of NNIT shares to 5.05 pct

title: BRIEF-FMR LLC ups its indirect holding of NNIT shares to 5.05 pct
text:
BRIEF-FMR LLC ups its indirect holding of NNIT shares to 5.05 pct Sept 4 
Sept 4 Nnit A/S : 
* FMR LLC has by share acquisition via its direct and indirect affiliates gained indirect holding of NNIT of 1,263,681 shares in in total of nominal value of 10 Danish crowns ($1.49) each, corresponding to 5.05 pct 
Source text for Eikon: 
Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.7163 Danish crowns) (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters

Thomson Reuters journalists are subject to an Editorial Handbook which requires fair presentation and disclosure of relevant interests.
